entry.title: JayDev078/TaskHub-for-Employees: TaskHub for Employees is a lightweight employee management system to simplify task handling. Admins can create tasks, assign them, track progress (Completed, Pending, Failed), and forward tasks. Employees can view, accept, or forward tasks and update statuses. Built with React.js, JavaScript, and Local Storage, itâ€™s efficient and backend-free.
entry.content: TaskHub for Employees is a lightweight employee management system to simplify task handling. Admins can create tasks, assign them, track progress (Completed, Pending, Failed), and forward tasks. Employees can view, accept, or forward tasks and update statuses. Built with React.js, JavaScript, and Local Storage, itâ€™s efficient and backend-free.

entry.title: jerry11671/hng-number-classification-api: A fast and lightweight REST API that classifies numbers based on their mathematical properties. It determines whether a number is prime, perfect, Armstrong, odd, or even and provides a fun fact from the Numbers API. Built with nodejs, deployed for public access, and fully documented.
entry.content: A fast and lightweight REST API that classifies numbers based on their mathematical properties.
